verses.text: Thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, The heaven \add is\add* my throne , and the earth \add is\add* my footstool : where \add is\add* the house that ye build unto me? and where \add is\add* the place of my rest ?

For all those \add things\add* hath mine hand made , and all those \add things\add* have been, saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: but to this \add man\add* will I look , \add even\add* to \add him that is\add* poor and of a contrite spirit , and trembleth at my word.

He that killeth an ox \add is as if\add* he slew a man ; he that sacrificeth a lamb , \add as if\add* he cut off a dog’s neck ; he that offereth an oblation , \add as if he offered\add* swine’s blood ; he that burneth incense , \add as if\add* he blessed an idol. Yea, they have chosen their own ways , and their soul delighteth in their abominations.\f + \fr 66.3 \ft lamb: or, kid\f*\f + \fr 66.3 \ft burneth: Heb. maketh a memorial of\f*

I also will choose their delusions , and will bring their fears upon them; because when I called , none did answer ; when I spake , they did not hear : but they did evil before mine eyes , and chose \add that\add* in which I delighted not.\f + \fr 66.4 \ft delusions: or, devices\f* \p

¶ Hear the word of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, ye that tremble at his word ; Your brethren that hated you, that cast you out for my name’s sake, said , Let the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* be glorified : but he shall appear to your joy , and they shall be ashamed.
A voice of noise from the city , a voice from the temple , a voice of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* that rendereth recompence to his enemies.
Before she travailed , she brought forth ; before her pain came , she was delivered of a man child.

Who hath heard such a thing? who hath seen such things? Shall the earth be made to bring forth in one day ? \add or\add* shall a nation be born at once ? for as soon as Zion travailed , she brought forth her children.

Shall I bring to the birth , and not cause to bring forth ? saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: shall I cause to bring forth , and shut \add the womb\add*? saith thy God.\f + \fr 66.9 \ft not…: or, not beget?\f*
Rejoice ye with Jerusalem , and be glad with her, all ye that love her: rejoice for joy with her, all ye that mourn for her:
That ye may suck , and be satisfied with the breasts of her consolations ; that ye may milk out , and be delighted with the abundance of her glory.\f + \fr 66.11 \ft abundance: or, brightness\f*

For thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, Behold, I will extend peace to her like a river , and the glory of the Gentiles like a flowing stream : then shall ye suck , ye shall be borne upon \add her\add* sides , and be dandled upon \add her\add* knees.
As one whom his mother comforteth , so will I comfort you; and ye shall be comforted in Jerusalem.

And when ye see \add this\add*, your heart shall rejoice , and your bones shall flourish like an herb : and the hand of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall be known toward his servants , and \add his\add* indignation toward his enemies. \p
For, behold, the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will come with fire , and with his chariots like a whirlwind , to render his anger with fury , and his rebuke with flames of fire.

For by fire and by his sword will the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* plead with all flesh : and the slain of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* shall be many.

They that sanctify themselves, and purify themselves in the gardens behind one \add tree\add* in the midst , eating swine’s flesh , and the abomination , and the mouse , shall be consumed together , saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 66.17 \ft behind…: or, one after another\f*
For I \add know\add* their works and their thoughts : it shall come , that I will gather all nations and tongues ; and they shall come , and see my glory.

And I will set a sign among them, and I will send those that escape of them unto the nations , \add to\add* Tarshish , Pul , and Lud , that draw the bow , \add to\add* Tubal , and Javan , \add to\add* the isles afar off , that have not heard my fame , neither have seen my glory ; and they shall declare my glory among the Gentiles.

And they shall bring all your brethren \add for\add* an offering unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* out of all nations upon horses , and in chariots , and in litters , and upon mules , and upon swift beasts , to my holy mountain Jerusalem , saith the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, as the children of Israel bring an offering in a clean vessel into the house of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.  +  r 66.20  t litters: or, coaches *
And I will also take of them for priests \add and\add* for Levites , saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
For as the new heavens and the new earth , which I will make , shall remain before me, saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, so shall your seed and your name remain.

And it shall come to pass, \add that\add* from one new moon to another , and from one sabbath to another , shall all flesh come to worship before me, saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 66.23 \ft from one new…: Heb. from new moon to his new moon, and from sabbath to his sabbath\f*

And they shall go forth , and look upon the carcases of the men that have transgressed against me: for their worm shall not die , neither shall their fire be quenched ; and they shall be an abhorring unto all flesh.
